1.0.name: wordpress/swipehq-payment-gateway-wp-e-commerce
1.0.description:
This is the SwipeHQ payment gateway for WP E-commerce. Allows you to use SwipeHQ payment gateway with the WP E-commerce plugin. It uses the redirect method, the user is redirected to swipehq so that you don't have to install an SSL certificate on your site.

Visit [http://www.swipehq.com]
